name: Bewarehouse
overview: The game: Get as many men as you can across the warehouse floor and up the ladder to safety. The problems: Unfortunately this warehouse is haunted, and ghosts don't like intruders. They will try to stop you like this: They will roll and throw boxes and barrels at you constantly — more on each level. On higher levels, ghosts will appear. They may either chase you or simply block your path for a while. Unlike the ghosts, your energy is limited, and drains even faster when you have to jump.
